name: Disable Admin Dashboard Notices – Get a distraction free WordPress backend
author: WPFraternity

sections.description:
“Disable Admin Dashboard Notices” is a handy WordPress plugin designed to streamline and enhance the user experience for WordPress website administrators. In the bustling world of website management, the WordPress Admin Dashboard can sometimes overwhelm users with an abundance of notices, alerts, and messages from various plugins. These notices, while informative, can clutter the workspace and distract from essential tasks.

This plugin addresses this issue by allowing users to disable or hide the notices from the WordPress dashboard. It achieves this by providing a user-friendly and intuitive solution. This plugin is intentionally lightweight and maintains WordPress standards. Once installed, the plugin enables users to toggle the visibility of notices with ease, helping them declutter the dashboard and create a more focused and distraction-free workspace.

Key features of the “Disable Admin Dashboard Notices” plugin include:

Dashboard Decluttering: Disable or hide the notices and notifications, reducing visual distractions for a cleaner and more focused Dashboard.

User-Friendly Interface: The plugin is designed with ease of use in mind, making it accessible to both beginners and experienced WordPress users.

Reversible: Users can easily revert changes by using the button from the Admin Bar beside the “Screen Options” to re-enable all notices they wish to see again. From there admin can hide them again.

Improved Productivity: By minimizing distractions and creating a more organized Dashboard, the plugin enhances productivity for WordPress website administrators and content creators.
sections.installation:
1. Press the Add New button on your WordPress Dashboard Plugins screen
  2. Search for “Hide Admin Notices”
  3. Press Install Now and then Activate
  4. The plugin will work straight away; there is nothing more to do!
sections.faq:
What does this plugin do?

It hides away all WordPress Dashboard Notices, Messages, and Update Nags that appear at the top of each screen.

You can see these notices at anytime simply by clicking the Show Notices button in the top right-hand corner.

sections.reviews:
Brilliant idea of a plugin

By Fred (fredawd) on November 18, 2023

Simple and effective! Just install and all the annoying dashboard notices get organized under a single button from the Admin Bar beside the “Screen Options”.

So, why rating this plugin just with one star?

Because WPFraternity copied ALL of the source code from Hide Admin Notices plugin by @pontetlabs without giving him the credits. That is unfair and, in my opinion, inappropriate.

Doesn't work: shows no "show notices" button

By BeeCee (csigncsign) on June 13, 2023

Doesn't work: shows no "show notices" button, therefor the plugin is useless.

Cannot go wrong with this plugin

By Website Rob on December 28, 2022

Works as advertized, no errors or warnings in error log and will actually speed up loading of Admin pages. What's not to like.

This is the best for disable admin notices

By webhold on November 20, 2022

We have tested all other plugins for this task - this is absolutely the best. With many others, the suppressed notices do appear for a second when you click around in the dashboard. This one is absolutely without any gaps - just perfect.
